amendment.description: To prevent a severe reduction in the Federal medical assistance percentage determined for a State for fiscal year 2006 and to extend rebates for prescription drugs to enrollees in Medicaid managed care organizations.

action.text: Amendment SA 2365 proposed by Senator Bingaman.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2365 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 45. Record Vote Number: 291.
